hero.title: Generate Documentation from Any Codebase
hero.subtitle: Zen Doc is an AI-powered CLI tool that automatically generates comprehensive documentation from your codebase using advanced AI — all with one simple command.

features.title: Everything you need for perfect docs
features.subtitle: ZenDoc combines the power of AI with developer-friendly tools to create documentation that actually helps your team and users.

oneCommand.title: One Command Setup
oneCommand.description: Generate comprehensive documentation with a single CLI command. No complex configuration required.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiPowered.description: Leverages Google Gemini AI to understand your code structure and generate intelligent documentation.

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Formats
multipleFormats.description: Export documentation in Markdown, HTML, PDF, or integrate directly with popular documentation platforms.

languageAgnostic.title: Language Agnostic
languageAgnostic.description: Works with any programming language or framework. From JavaScript to Python, React to Django.

gitIntegration.title: Git Integration
gitIntegration.description: Automatically detects changes and updates documentation. Seamlessly integrates with your Git workflow.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Process thousands of files in seconds. Optimized for performance with intelligent caching.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Watch mode automatically regenerates docs when your code changes. Perfect for active development.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your code never leaves your machine. All processing happens locally with secure API calls.

customizableThemes.title: Customizable Themes
customizableThemes.description: Choose from beautiful pre-built themes or create your own. Match your brand and style.
